name: David Llanos LÃ³pez
title: Senior Front End Developer
summary:
Senior front end developer with 8+ years of experience building websites and interactive user experiences for startups.
Interested in Clean Code, Test Driven Development, Web Components, Design Systems, Artificial Intelligence and Game Development.

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description:
ReHub
dycare.com
The project consisted in the creation of a digital solution for home-based rehabilitation. My duties involved creating the project from scratch and mantaining it. The code was a Monorepo and consisted of 2 Angular projects and one Vue project, I implemented Web Components to have reusable components on all projects and started a Design System. I used MoveNet to track the patients full body in realtime and analyze the data with WebAssembly. The body landmarks and the result was rendered using Canvas. I acquired some experience using AWS, such as S3, DynamoDB, CodeCommit and CodeDeploy. I made unit testing with Jest, and some with Cypress Storybook, I also trained and guided Junior Developers to help me with development.

experience.title: Game Developer
experience.description:
City Nostra
The project consisted in the creation of a location-based game with a mafia theme. My duties involved creating from scratch the Android version of the game.

Beaconing - Context Aware Challenges Authoring Tool
The project consisted in creating a platform for teachers to create location-based games. My duties involved creating the front end, made with Bootstrap and jQuery. And the back end, made with PHP.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer - Freelance
experience.description: The project consisted in the creation of a website for a wood flooring company. My duties involved creating the front and back end as well as mantaining the website. The stack I used was composed of Express.js as back end framework, Parse as database and Bootstrap as front end framework.

experience.title: Android and iOS Developer - Internship
experience.description: My duties involved creating both an Android and iOS app from scratch with user management and push notifications.

projects.title: Final Degree Project
projects.description:
davidllanos22.github.io/tfg
The project consisted in the creation of a website where you can create facial avatars in pixel art style with realtime face tracking. Made with Vue and MediaPipe.

projects.title: Game Jams
projects.description: I participated many times in game jams such as Ludum Dare and Global Game Jam.
